ToolTipDonate:
Thanks for using this program, I hope you enjoy it.
You can donate to this project so I can keep improving it.
Click this button to find out how to donate.
ToolTipHardSub:
Permanent Subtitle inside video!

1. Only read first stream subtitle!
2. Only read SubRip and SubStation Alpha
ReadProjectFile: Reading project file, this may take awhile.

frmOption.rdoFFmpeg64: FFmpeg &64bit (AviSynth+ 64-bit, 4K UHD && High Bit Depth/Deep Colour)
frmOption.lblFrameCountOffset: Variable frame rate will be converted to constant frame rate. By adding an offset value, the decoder will compensate broken container data with a higher frame count to ensure no frames are missing during encoding.

frmShutdown.lblInfo: What should I do after encoding?

InputBoxNewMedia.Title: New media file
InputBoxNewMedia.Message:
You're about to create a blank stream of video, audio, subtitles and fonts.
You can use it to add files, convert them or just merge them (like Mkvtoolnix or MP4Box)

Enter a new file name:

InputBoxEncodingPreset.Title: Save a new encoding preset
InputBoxEncodingPreset.Message:
You're about to create a new encoding preset based on the current configuration.
With this preset, you can re-use on others video.

Enter a new name:

InputBoxCommandLineFFmpeg.Title: Decoder command-line
InputBoxCommandLineFFmpeg.Message:
Modify decoder command-line arguments in FFmpeg
Example: -vf scale=640:480

MsgBoxShutdown.Title: Question
MsgBoxShutdown.Message: This computer will shutdown or restart after everything is done. Do you want to proceed?

MsgBoxSaveFolder.Title: Invalid Path
MsgBoxSaveFolder.Message: Saving over network is not supported, please pick a drive.

MsgBoxCodecIncompatible.Title: Incompatible Codec
MsgBoxCodecIncompatible.Message: Output format and codec are not compatible! Choose different one.

MsgNewProject.Title: New Project
MsgNewProject.Message: Do you want to save this project before create new one?

MsgHardSub.Title: Render custom fonts (Hard Sub)
MsgHardSub.Message: Please allow IFME run as Administrator to install embedded font, this way Hard Sub able to render custom font.
